TEXT.TITLE: CAMBRIDGE MEDICAL <CMTC> IN DEAL ON AIDS TEST
TEXT.BODY: Cambridge Medical Technology corp said it has signed a letter of intent with Panbaxy Laboratories to jointly make a new AIDS test. The company said it will have the exclusive right to market the product worldwide. The new test will be used to detect specific viral antigens in serum and whole blood samples. It said it hopes to design a simplified test for home use. Reuter
